name: Date 8
description:
PreAlpha 0.0.42

Project Date 8 is a family friendly adventure dating game. The player is at a speed dating event and has 1 hour to match with 8 quirky characters.

The player begins outside of a restaurant hosting the speed dating event. Once inside the player can talk to the host character before the time starts. The timer will start once completing the hosts dialog OR walking past them into the restaurant.

Project Date 8 features numerous puzzles, branching dialog, minigames, bad jokes and most importantly: 8 characters with gripping stories for you to get to know!

The game is currently in early development, many features maybe absent or incomplete.

Controls

  • Walk - WASD
  • Run - Shift
  • Interact - Left Click

Debug options:

When in free mode-  Hold "J" to skip to the Ask Out nametag section
